arts.ttl: Jonathan Burkardt shines as clinical Mainz down St. Pauli
arts.sum: The brilliant Jonathan Burkardt scored twice as Mainz secured a 3-0 win against St. Pauli on Matchday 6. Despite St. Pauli's dominance in possession and shot attempts, they couldn't find a way through Mainz's resolute defence before the half-time whistle.

arts.ttl: Burkardt bags brace as Mainz stun wasteful St. Pauli
arts.sum: St Pauli were unable to build on their win over Freiburg as they went down 0-3 to Mainz at the Millerntor.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs Mainz preview: Host's look to secure first home win
arts.sum: St. Pauli secured their first win of the campaign last time out against SC Freiburg and will hope to continue their form and pick up their first home triumph against Mainz on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
